column1: HRTC of an 80-year-old man with dyspnea and fever tested positive for COVID-19
column2: exam performed 5 days from the onset.

column1: Image A : reconstruction with Lung algorithm, axial image. Multiple opacities a frosted glass with which, in particular to the lower lung lobes, thickening of the interlobular septa with an crazy paving appearance ( black circle ) isappreciated. Linear thickening with mantle-subpleural distribution ( full black arrow )is also present.
Image B : Coronal reconstruction showing the predominantly peripheral distribution of frosted glass opacities ( empty black arrows ).
